item.description:

jme:

Totally different sport, but I love to loooong board

Isn’t that a type of skating? I’ve tried it, kinda different but hard

i do it, i go to the skatepark everyday in the summer ;D

You should go to indoor parks in the winter

item.title: Any1 here sk8 board?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“Mack n cheese, post:5, topic:385485”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=481236.msg3523933#msg3523933 date=1299634708]

it used to be my life. now the town i live in it’s hard too. i still do sometimes, whenever my imaginary friends want to (since i have no real friends)

why u have no frends?
[/quote]i was kidding. ahaha, i have my mom.
no but i actually used to do skate competitions just for fun and at a spring break contest last year i won 70$ which is awesome of course.[/quote]Dayum You should buy Microsoft.

Read full topic

item.title: Any1 here sk8 board?
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:9, topic:385485”]I rollerblade sometimes, I can only jump (is it ollie?) with rollerblades[/quote]No it wouldn’t be an ollie. An ollie is the transition between the popping of wood bouncing from a solid surface to sliding your front foot upwards to level out the deck while jumping and raising your legs. Like snowboarding or anything where the device is attached to your feet, it is just jumping.

I’ve been skating on and off for about 2 years now.

Read full topic

item.title: Any1 here sk8 board?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I started skating when I was 3, I am now over 9000.

I’m pretty sure I can skate bettet than you all.

/kidding

but for reals; I rollerblade. :D[/quote]

I rollerblade sometimes, I can only jump (is it ollie?) with rollerblades

r0ckstar96:

I started skateboarding at 8 and haven’t progressed at all. I can ollie and boardslide(well, rather just slide my skateboard onto the 6" rail). I plan on getting back into skateboarding this summer and getting more fit to skateboard.

You’ll get better!

Read full topic

ahaha i remember when i ate shit real hard and when someone asked “are you ok” i say “did it look cool?” and if they say no, i say i’m not ok, if they say yes i say yea i’m fine
